text: Stewart Cheifet (; born September 24, 1938) is an American television presenter and academic. He is best known for his work presenting and producing Computer Chronicles and Net Cafe. He has also worked in other reporting jobs for PBS and ABC. He also works for the University of Nevada, Reno. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:Academics from Nevada Category:American television presenters Category:People from Reno, Nevada
title: Stewart Cheifet
